ygData.subject: Re: EQ Report
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I don t think we dissagree at all. I am also a teacher and a professional consultant who gives presentations for a living. My point was not to use
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I don't think we dissagree at all. I am
also a teacher and a professional consultant who gives
presentations for a living. My point was not to use too many,
not that they shouldn't be used.<br><br>The idea of
having a "unique" visual aid is a good one, just don't
spend all your five minutes trying to pull everyone's
attention away from your hand-outs.<br><br>You want the
audience to listen to you, not focus on something you gave
them. Whatever visual aids you use, they should not
distract the audience from what you are saying.<br><br>The
wonderful thing about opinions is that pretty much everyone
has one. It was a great idea to solicit ideas on a
message board. You will probably learn as much from that
as from giving the presentation! RELAX, HAVE FUN and
GOOD LUCK! ;-)
